name: Sushi Break: Head to Head
summary: Sushi Break: Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated Sushi tumble down toward the users paddle along with Sushi Mini-Bosses and Sushi Powerups. Collect sushi powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Sushi Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.
